articles.title: Scientists unearth skunk that walked among dinosaurs - CBC.ca
articles.description: A fossil of a skunk-like mammal that lived during the age of dinosaurs has been discovered in Chilean Patagonia, adding further proof to recent evidence that mammals roamed that part of South America a lot earlier than previously thought.
articles.content: A fossil of a skunk-like mammal that lived during the age of dinosaurs has been discovered in Chilean Patagonia, adding further proof to recent evidence that mammals roamed that part of South America… [+1743 chars]

articles.author: Canadian Press
articles.title: American, Russians dock at International Space Station - BayToday
articles.description: MOSCOW — A trio of Russian and American space travellers launched successfully and reached the International Space Station on Friday.
articles.content:
MOSCOW A trio of Russian and American space travellers
 launched successfully and reached the International Space Station on Friday.
